localizedDocumentations.label: [OfferedTo] New work item
localizedDocumentations.description: Today at ${system.time}, a new work item has been offered to you. You may accept it.

localizedDocumentations.label: [Proposé] Nouveau bon de travail
localizedDocumentations.description: Aujourd'hui à ${system.time}, un nouveau bon de travail vous a été proposé. Vous pouvez le prendre en charge.

localizedDocumentations.label: [AllocatedTo] New work item
localizedDocumentations.description: Today at ${system.time}, a new work item has been allocated to you.

localizedDocumentations.label: [Alloué] Nouveau bon de travail
localizedDocumentations.description: Aujourd'hui à ${system.time}, un nouveau bon de travail vous a été alloué.

localizedDocumentations.label: ${workflow.workItem.label} Task for ${workflow.process.label}
localizedDocumentations.description:
MDM Workflow Task Notification
Workflow Step - ${workflow.workItem.label}
On ${system.date} at ${system.time}, a workflow step was created
Click Here to ${workflow.currentStep.label}
Workflow step label: ${workflow.currentStep.label} for ${workflow.workItem.offeredTo}
Workflow step description: ${workflow.currentStep.description}
Workflow instance label: ${workflow.process.label}
Workflow instance description: ${recordNameValue} ${workflow.process.description}
Last updated by: ${currentUserLabel}

Last comment from user ${workflow.lastComment}

localizedDocumentations.label: REMINDER: ${workflow.workItem.label} Task for ${workflow.process.label}
localizedDocumentations.description:

localizedDocumentations.label: ${workflow.currentStep.label} Step for ${workflow.process.label}
localizedDocumentations.description:
MDM Workflow Step Error notification
Workflow Step - ${workflow.currentStep.label}
On ${system.date} at ${system.time}, an error occurred in this workflow step
Login to EBX and go to "Active workflows" view to check the issue and fix/replay the step in error.
Workflow step label: ${workflow.currentStep.label}
Workflow step description: ${workflow.currentStep.description}
Workflow instance label: ${workflow.process.label}
